page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: This area is mainly agricultural, and contains two villages and one hamlet. The larger village is Kilmington, and the information on this disc has been compiled by the children of Kilmington Primary School. {Kilmington}has an area of 727 hectares, 309 households and a population of 700, of which 108(15.5%) are under 16 years of age and 264(37.7%)are of pensionable age. {Shute}has an area of 296 hectares, 212 households and a population of 672, of which 125(18.7%) are under 16 and 192(28.6%) are pensionable. {Hampton}consists of one farm and six houses. Although some crops, such as cereals and kale, are grown, dairy farming is the main type of agriculture, and Friesian cows are the commonest.
